title: Collaborative Science Learning Design Based on Intelligent Tutoring Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced knowledge in science fields and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Science Education Utilizing VR Simulation and Collaboration Tools in a Smartphone-Centric Restricted Technology Environment

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more collaborative science learning scenarios using an intelligent tutoring system (ITS) by applying the IMS-LD framework.
Learners can identify personalized learning paths with over 80% accuracy by utilizing adaptive feedback features of ITS during scientific problem-solving.
Learners can simulate the scientific inquiry process in a VR-based collaborative environment while applying role distribution and communication strategies with over 90% effectiveness.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
